overview: Camera is a breathtaking, Emirati genre movie with a lot of action, drama, and suspense that enthralls your attention from the very first second to the last. It is the horrific, yet fascinating story of 3 friends who found a camera buried in the fiery hot sands of a dessert during an adventure with other friends. Out of curiosity, they sought to uncover the contents of the camera only to find disturbing secrets - a discovery that is soon to become their worst nightmares. FAM Films is an Emirati Local Film Company that has one major goal - to produce world-class localized films like Camera, with the best of the high-level production materials that can be found anywhere in the world
title: Camera
